Articles.Content:
They haven't been made yet.

Alright, looking forward to the next update! You and Benjee are making stuff of dreams reality. Hats off to you guys!

They haven't been made yet. Every other part that I made after benjee textured it initially have been textured by using the one he made, using different shapes and colors. The rear landing gear coloring is so simple and subtle, and the box on the bottom and the VTOL are both supposed to be the same color as the bottom of the ranger, so I was able to use the default texture to do it.

God this thing is fun. Around Kerbin once and landed on the VAB, with zero fuel left. only lost the front RCS on touch down.

http://i.imgur.com/ZFGJqYk.png

Shryq the Ranger is just Awesome right now!!! without a doubt, now im just noticing a missing piece, solar panels on the top of the wing?
should we make custom docking ports that looks like the ones in the movie?
If they were compatible with all the other ingame docking ports that would be a fantastic feature.

Shryq the Ranger is just Awesome right now!!! without a doubt, now im just noticing a missing piece, solar panels on the top of the wing?

That's a texturing thing on my part. I'll get that done today hopefully!

Ranger is awesome Shryq. Great job!
Damn. Feels good.

http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j359/flo_22_ro/screenshot28_zpsd5ff079a.png' alt='screenshot28_zpsd5ff079a.png'>

this thing is amazing!

great job for making this mod.

When should we expect the IVA's for the Lander and the Ranger? The Ranger is amazing, but it's textureless interior is starting to make my eyes bleed. Also, the Ranger IVA still is a little glitchy with the windows, as you can still see the grey bits of the outer mesh.

Working on texturing the Ranger IVA at the moment. Not sure how long it'll take to implement since Shryq is handling all things Ranger-based, but I can get the majority of the texture work done tomorrow I would think. Then I'll be giving the Command Module and Habitation Module some IVA love.

The window glitch is being caused by rescaling the Ranger model but it's fixable within the config file by adding a slight vertical offset to th IVA. That's something I'll sort out when the Ranger gets bundled with the main release!

When should we expect the IVA's for the Lander and the Ranger? The Ranger is amazing, but it's textureless interior is starting to make my eyes bleed. Also, the Ranger IVA still is a little glitchy with the windows, as you can still see the grey bits of the outer mesh.

Don't expect it ever. Just be pleasantly surprised when it's released.

I think the IVA is acutally... too small. Check this out: http://imgur.com/a/alt2Q The windows are numbered, the kerbal's foot and the front of that girder are lined in red. Look where they're at.

Think we can thin out the rim of the windows, the visibility is pretty bad at some angles.

Edited February 15, 2015 by Shryq

I still think the Ranger exterior is a little too big. It dwarfs the Lander whereas they should really be about the same size.

Progress so far. I'll finish the texturing and hand over to you to tweak however you like!

I still think the Ranger exterior is a little too big. It dwarfs the Lander whereas they should really be about the same size.

I must agree, we have to make sure the ship itself isn't too big before we worry about the IVA being too small.
On the ranger the pilot (Cooper) is sitting on the left side not the right
Last update for tonight:
Benjee, that is looking absolutely beautiful.

Last update for tonight:

this is beyond epic

Last update for tonight:

Oh my lord! The hype never ends!
...And it never will.

This is the Lander IVA

My gawd. Oh much gawd. Like. Just whaaaaat. The hype. I just. Can't. Handle. The. Hype.

Ranger is done:

WOOOAAHH!!!! DATS SO COOL, shouldn't u color the windown borders?
WOW ... amazing work.

And lander is on the way:

I was thinking the robot on the lander should be KURT.
